body.p: The core of can be deployed on a server, allowing a variety of HTML5-enabled client devices to edit and review XML content.

WebApp Component is a highly versatile application which can be customized to work with any XML vocabulary and any file repository system. It uses the same extension points as the standalone version of oXygen XML Author: frameworks, options, and plugins. The frameworks, options and plugins used by the WebApp Component are very similar with those used in the oXygen XML product suite. This means that you can use them with a high degree of compatibility across oXygen products.

section.title: A Graphical Description of the System

body.p: The was designed to accommodate a large degree of customization.

section.title: Options
section.p: Functionality is common with the standalone distribution of , as they share the same options. This allows you to configure a consistent editing experience for all users.

section.title: Documentation Frameworks
section.p: Custom documentation frameworks can be re-used between the standalone distribution and the .The comes bundled with specially tuned frameworks for . Any other framework from the standalone distribution can also be customized and used in the .

section.title: Server Side
section.p: The server side can be customized by using a series of plugins.

section.title: Client Side
section.p: Client side customization is available through a JavaScript API. Unlike the server side customization, it can be used to modify the application's GUI.
